Trusted Manufacturer Partnerships

Direct vendor relationships mean better pricing, support, and product availability for our customers

Why Our Vendor Relationships Matter

Our direct partnerships with leading access control and door hardware manufacturers provide significant advantages for our customers. Better pricing, priority product availability, direct technical support, and streamlined warranty service - all because we maintain strong relationships with the companies that make the products you depend on.

Request Quote View Products

AUTHORIZED PARTNERS

Featured Partnerships

Allegion - Authorized Partner

Comprehensive Commercial Security Solutions

Schlage Commercial • Von Duprin Exit Devices • LCN Door Closers

As an authorized Allegion partner, we provide complete access to their industry-leading product lines:

  • Schlage electronic and mechanical locks
  • Von Duprin exit devices and panic hardware
  • LCN door closers and automatic operators
  • CISA high-security cylinders and locks

Benefits:

  • Factory-direct pricing and priority availability
  • Certified technician training and support
  • Direct warranty service and rapid parts replacement
  • Access to latest product innovations and technologies

Additional Manufacturing Partners

We maintain direct relationships with multiple leading manufacturers to provide comprehensive solutions for every project requirement.

Our vendor partnerships include manufacturers of:

  • Electronic access control systems
  • Commercial locksets and hardware
  • Exit devices and panic hardware
  • Door closers and operators
  • Specialty security products

Partnership Advantages

Direct Pricing

No Middleman Markup

We purchase directly from manufacturers, eliminating distributor markups and passing savings on to our customers.

Priority Availability

First Access to Inventory

Direct relationships mean priority access to products, especially during high-demand periods or supply constraints.

Technical Support

Manufacturer-Backed Expertise

Our technicians receive factory training and have direct access to manufacturer technical teams for complex installations.

Warranty Service

Streamlined Claims Process

Direct vendor relationships simplify warranty claims and ensure rapid resolution of product issues.

Product Categories

Access Control Systems

  • Electronic locks and credentials
  • Card readers and mobile access
  • Control panels and software
  • Integration and networking equipment

Mechanical Door Hardware

  • Commercial locksets and cylinders
  • Exit devices and panic hardware
  • Door closers and operators
  • Hinges, pivots, and accessories

Specialty Applications

  • High-security systems
  • Fire-rated assemblies
  • Delayed egress devices
  • Custom finishes and specifications

Vendor Certification

Factory-Trained Technicians

Our installation team maintains current certifications from our manufacturing partners, ensuring installations meet exact specifications and warranty requirements.

Ongoing Education

Regular training on new products and technologies keeps our team current with industry developments and best practices.

Technical Documentation

Complete access to technical specifications, installation guides, and troubleshooting resources for all partner products.

Ready to benefit from our vendor partnerships?
